thread.section_title: Soho Grand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Grand Hotel!
thread.title_full: Grand Hotel! - Review of Soho Grand Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: fbmNewJersey
title: Grand Hotel!
text:
Loved the hotel and staff including doormen and valet! Quiet room with city view of Empire State Building! Wonderful grand salon/bar. Very busy with wonderful wait staff and delicious food/ healthy as well and yummy drink menu. Very busy on Saturday night. If you can land a table, grab it. Great location in Soho- we were able to walk everywhere. Would stay again in heartbeat!
Room Tip: Get a room with city view- worth it! See more room tips
